00040 class RNetMessage : public RDK2::Object
00041 {
00042     public:
00044         enum Type {
00045             PEER_IDENTIFICATION = 1,    
00046             PROPERTY_UPDATE = 2,        
00047             COORDINATION = 3,       
00048             TEST = 4,           
00049             HARDWARE_SERVER = 5,

00053

00057             USER = 999,
00058             USAR_COMSTATION = 12,   
00059             HARDWARESERVER = HARDWARE_SERVER    // FIXME DEPRECATED
00060         };
00061

00064         RNetMessage();

00111
